column1: join_quebec_desc;Our position on the North American continent
column2: and our traditional cultural ties to Quebec
column3: make it likely that Quebec would be willing to negotiate our entrance into the confederation. Doing this means our country will be annexed by Quebec.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: lou_is_ours_desc;Our position on the North American continent means that Louisiana will block us from any expansion. They are a small country and so we will offer them statehood
